sn47.21:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma ca anando ayasma ca bhaddo pataliputte viharanti kukkutarame.
sn47.21:1.3: Atha kho ayasma bhaddo sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodi.
sn47.21:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma bhaddo ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
sn47.21:1.5: “yanimani, avuso ananda, kusalani silani vuttani bhagavata, imani kusalani silani kimatthiyani vuttani bhagavata”ti?
sn47.21:2.2: Bhaddako kho te, avuso bhadda, ummango, bhaddakam patibhanam, kalyani paripuccha.
sn47.21:2.4: ‘yanimani, avuso ananda, kusalani silani vuttani bhagavata, imani kusalani silani kimatthiyani vuttani bhagavata’”ti?
sn47.21:2.6: “Yanimani, avuso bhadda, kusalani silani vuttani bhagavata, imani kusalani silani yavadeva catunnam satipatthananam bhavanaya vuttani bhagavata.
sn47.21:3.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.21:3.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.21:3.6: Yanimani, avuso bhadda, kusalani silani vuttani bhagavata, imani kusalani silani yavadeva imesam catunnam satipatthananam bhavanaya vuttani bhagavata”ti.
